name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.storageGet
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        text/prompt_key:
          label: Key:
          required@bool: yes
          type: freeform
          default@text:
            some.arbitrary.identifier
          placeholder: (some.arbitrary.identifier)
        text/prompt_default:
          label: Default:
          type: freeform
          default@text:
            This is a default value.
          placeholder: (an arbitrary default value)
        
  return:
    snippet@text:
      storage.get/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        inputs:
          # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/storage.get/
          key: {{prompt_key}}
          default: {{prompt_default}}
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
